text: Koly vy bachyte yikh, vy mozhete buty vrazheni yikhnimy pohlyadamy. Ta koly vony rozmovlyayutʹ, vy mozhete poslukhaty yikhnyu krasnomovnistʹ. Vony vyhlyadayutʹ yak postiyni kolody. Vony dumayutʹ shcho kozhnyy vyklyk mayetʹsya namir proty nykh. Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu realʹnykh vorohiv; ber yikh. BOH zasudzhuye yikh; vony deviated
